section.title: work orders history by order number Work Order History by W/O Number
section.para: To view Work Order History by Work Order Number, select the "Work Order History by W/O Number" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Work Order History by Work Order Number

note.para: Work Order Materials and Operations history is saved in the database after a Work Order is closed. Reports can be written to retrieve this information.

section.para: When displaying Work Order History by Work Order Number, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the parent Work Order whose history you want to view. The field accepts only parent Work Order Numbers. Child Work Order Numbers--those containing a dash and a number following the Work Order Number--will not be recognized.

varlistentry.term: Only Show Top Level Work Orders

listitem.para: Select to show only top level Work Orders in the "Work Orders" display.
Select to display Work Order Costs in the "Work Orders" display.
Display lists Work Order History by Work Order Number, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.

section.para: Right-clicking on a Work Order in the Work Orders list enables you to select from the following menu options:
